summary: My version of a Breton Follower
descriptionHtml:
Please remember to stop back by and ENDORSE the file if you like her.

ABOUT HER:
She is a spellsword
She has the following spells:  Healing, Fast Healing, Sparks, Lightning Bolt, Stoneflesh, Oakflesh, Lightning Cloak.

Versions: I will release another version of this one soon.

LOCATION: She is located in Riften, Temple of Mara.


REQUIRED MODs: The only requirement for this mod is Apachii Hair.
ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168 - A deep thanks for Apachii\'s work!!

Need optional Apachii file.
ApachiiSkyHairFemale_v_1_0

ARMOR: The armor in the pics are from Lustrianna and Turbosnowy.
LustDesign - Dovahkiin Mercenary Gear by Lustrianna
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15804

Fetish Armour Collection by Turbosnowy
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15632

JEWELRY: The Jewelry she is wearing in a couple pics are by SidneyB and HumanNature66
Ashara Dimonized Dress and Dragon jewelry by SidneyB
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14146

HN66s Earrings by humannature66
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11130


NOTE:
She will stay where you dismiss her. She will not return to Kynareth Temple.


PLEASE: If you enjoy the companion, please be kind enough to endorse the file and maybe post a pic of her in the armor you chose.

THANKS: \"Thank you for all those modders out there for making this game that much more enjoyable.\"

SPECIAL THANKS: I learned how to do this over the last couple of days from a fellow modder named BravoOskar. He graciously took the time to put up a tutorial, so that some of us could try to do something like this. 

QUESTIONS YOU MIGHT ASK:
Q. I downloaded Fayleen and she doesn\'t look like your pictures.
A. I am using several mods that make characters in game look better. The main ones are:

Q. Why don\'t you give her some of the really cool armor I see in the pics.
A. That would make the armor a requirement and I want to keep the requirements small.

1. Better Females by BellaGail - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812
2. Covereyes by Mr Lenski - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4869
3. Coverwomen by Mr Lenski - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4869
4. Calientes Female Body Mod by Caliente - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666


IF YOU LIKE THIS COMPANION, MAYBE YOU\'LL LIKE MY OTHER ONES:
BreeLynn - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24139
Dometria - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24161
Arianna - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24145
Jazmin - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24248
Rebecca - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24293
Alexandra - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24369






[size=7][color=Deeppink][font=Vivaldi][center]Ashara\'s Armour[/size][/color][/font][/center]
[color=Deeppink][font=Vivaldi][center][size=10]- Princess of the Woods -[/color][/font][/center][/size]
[color=Deepskyblue][font=Georgia][center][size=2]This mod has been converted into other languages[/color][/font][/center][/size][center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23508]Russian translation by Eriko[/url]
[url=http://www.scharesoft.de/joomla/index.php?]German translation by Rikash[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23901]German translation by Verodor[/url][/center]

[size=6][color=Deepskyblue][font=Vivaldi][center][u]Description[/u][/size][/color][/font][/center][size=5][color=Dodgerblue][font=Vijaya][center]This mod adds \"The Princess of the Woods\" light armour
to Skyrim. The armour is composed of 9 different pieces that can be created at
any normal forge and are craft-able under the Leather section. All pieces are
upgradable at workbenches and are fully enchantable.

The ratings for Bodice, Boots and Bracers are those of Dragonscale armour except
the weight that is the one of the elven armour.

The armour comes in 6 different colours: Green, Brown, Black, White, Red and Olive. 
This makes a total of 54 new items added to the game. You can combine the pieces of 
the different colours.

I\'ve followed the slot usage convention explained here
[url=http://wiki.tesnexus.com/index.php/Skyrim_bodyparts_number]Skyrim BodyParts Number[/url] 
[/size][/color][/font][/center]


Version: 2.0
Date: 06-07-2012
Category: Armour
Requirements: Latest Skyrim official patch
Author(s): Ashara
Source:
* Nexus: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18008
* Russian translation by Eriko:
** on modgames: http://modgames.net/load/306-1-0-12184
** on Nexus: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23508
* German translation by Rikash:
** on scharesoft: http://www.scharesoft.de/joomla/index.php?option=com_remository&Itemid=27&func=fileinfo&id=2589
** on eir dei zeit: http://www.egg-of-time.us/portal/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=2243
* German translation by Verodor:
** on Nexus: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23901
author: Sharky Borror
